Package mainClasses

Class Database

java.lang.Object
mainClasses.Database
public class Database extends Object
The Databases class contains methods for interacting with a database.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ciprian Banci

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Database()
    Constructs a new Database instance with default authentication information for a MySQL database running locally on port 3306 with a database name of "aba_project", a user name of "root", and a password of "#db2002".

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    checkIfTablesExists()
    Checks if the necessary tables exist in the database and creates them if they don't.
    boolean
    findUser(String email, String password)
    Searches the 'users' table in the database for a user with the specified email and password.

    getAdmin(String email, String password)

  • Constructor Details

    • Database

      public Database()
      Constructs a new Database instance with default authentication information for a MySQL database running locally on port 3306 with a database name of "aba_project", a user name of "root", and a password of "#db2002". This constructor also checks if the required tables exist in the database and creates them if they do not exist.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Database getInstance()
      Returns a singleton instance of the Database class.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of the Database class

    • refreshPayStatusDB

      public void refreshPayStatusDB(Apartment apartment)
      Updates the pay status of an apartment in the database.
      Parameters:
      apartment - the apartment to update

    • insertDates

      public void insertDates(Association association)
      Inserts paying dates for an association into the database.
      Parameters:
      association - the association to update

    • getLastAdminId

      public Integer getLastAdminId()
      Returns the last admin ID from the "admins" table in the database.
      Returns:
      the last admin ID or 1 if there is no admin in the database.

    • getLastAssociationId

      public int getLastAssociationId()
      Returns the last association ID from the "associations_new" table in the database.
      Returns:
      the last association ID or 1 if there is no association in the database.

    • isUniqueEmail

      public boolean isUniqueEmail(String email)
      Checks if an email is unique in the "users" table in the database.
      Parameters:
      email - the email to check.
      Returns:
      true if the email is unique, false otherwise

    • getLastIdApartment

      public int getLastIdApartment()
      Returns the last apartment ID from the "apartments" table in the database.
      Returns:
      the last apartment ID or 1 if there is no apartment in the database.

    • getMessLastId

      public int getMessLastId()
      Returns the last message ID from the "message" table in the database.
      Returns:
      the last message ID or 1 if there is no message in the database.

    • insertMessage

      public void insertMessage(Message mes)
      Inserts a new message to the database.
      Parameters:
      mes - the Message object to be inserted

    • getMessagesFromDB

      public List<Message> getMessagesFromDB(Association association)
      Retrieves all messages from the database that belong to a given Association.
      Parameters:
      association - the Association object to which the messages belong
      Returns:
      a List containing all Message objects that belong to the given Association

    • insertAllData

      public void insertAllData(Association association)
      Inserts all the data related to an Association object into the database by calling the corresponding methods.
      Parameters:
      association - the Association object whose data will be inserted into the database.

    • insertNewApartments

      public void insertNewApartments(Association association)
      Inserts data related to apartments of association into the database.
      Parameters:
      association - the Association object whose apartments' data will be inserted into the database.

    • insertNewAdmin

      public void insertNewAdmin(Admin admin)
      Inserts data related to an Admin object into the database.
      Parameters:
      admin - the Admin object whose data will be inserted into the database.

    • insertNewAssociation

      public void insertNewAssociation(Association association)
      Inserts a new association into the database.
      Parameters:
      association - the association to be inserted into the database

    • insertNewPrices

      public void insertNewPrices(Association association)
      Inserts new prices for an association into the database.
      Parameters:
      association - the association for which prices are being updated

    • refreshAdminNumberDB

      public void refreshAdminNumberDB(Admin admin)
      Refreshes the phone number of an admin in the database.
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin whose phone number is being updated

    • refreshAdminPasswordDB

      public void refreshAdminPasswordDB(Admin admin)
      Refreshes the password of an admin in the database.
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin whose password is being updated

    • updateApartment

      public void updateApartment(Apartment apartment)
      Update the information of an apartment in the database
      Parameters:
      apartment - the apartment to be updated

    • getAssociation

      public Association getAssociation(User user)
      Get the association related to the given user
      Parameters:
      user - the user to get the association for
      Returns:
      the association object related to the user

    • getTotalPeople

      public Integer getTotalPeople(Association association)
      Returns the total number of people living in the apartments of the given association.
      Parameters:
      association - The association to retrieve information for.
      Returns:
      The total number of people living in the apartments of the association.

    • getTotalArea

      public Double getTotalArea(Association association)
      Returns the total area of all apartments belonging to the given association.
      Parameters:
      association - The association to retrieve information for.
      Returns:
      The total area of all apartments belonging to the association.

    • getApartments

      public List<Apartment> getApartments(Association association)
      Returns a list of all apartments belonging to the given association.
      Parameters:
      association - The association to retrieve information for.
      Returns:
      A list of all apartments belonging to the association, sorted by apartment number.

    • getPayingDates

      public List<Date> getPayingDates(Association association)
      Returns a list of dates representing the paying dates for the specified association. If any dates are from the previous month, they are deleted from the database.
      Parameters:
      association - the association for which to retrieve the paying dates
      Returns:
      a list of Date objects representing the paying dates for the specified association

    • getPrices

      public void getPrices(Association association)
      Retrieves the prices for the specified association from the database and updates the association object.
      Parameters:
      association - the association for which to retrieve the prices

    • getAdmin

      public Admin getAdmin(Apartment apartment)
      Retrieves the admin for the specified apartment's association from the database and returns an Admin object.
      Parameters:
      apartment - the apartment for which to retrieve the admin's association
      Returns:
      an Admin object representing the admin of the specified apartment's association, or null if not found

    • getAdmin

      public Admin getAdmin(String email, String password)
      Returns an Admin object from the database if the email and password match those in the 'admins' table.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the admin to search for
      password - the password of the admin to search for
      Returns:
      an Admin object if the email and password match those in the 'admins' table, or null otherwise

    • getApartment

      public Apartment getApartment(String email, String password)
      Returns an Apartment object from the database if the email and password match those in the 'apartments' table.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the apartment to search for
      password - the password of the apartment to search for
      Returns:
      an Apartment object if the email and password match those in the 'apartments' table, or null otherwise

    • findUser

      public boolean findUser(String email, String password)
      Searches the 'users' table in the database for a user with the specified email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user to search for
      password - the password of the user to search for
      Returns:
      true if the user is found in the 'users' table, or false otherwise

    • UpdateAllData

      public void UpdateAllData(Association association)
      Updates all data related to an association including: apartments, admin, paying dates, association, and prices.
      Parameters:
      association - the association object whose data will be updated

    • updateApartments

      public void updateApartments(Association association)
      Updates apartment information for the given association in the database.
      Parameters:
      association - the association whose apartments data will be updated

    • updateAdmin

      public void updateAdmin(Admin admin)
      Updates admin information for the given admin object in the database.
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin object whose data will be updated

    • updatePayingDates

      public void updatePayingDates(Association association)
      Updates paying dates information for the given association in the database.
      Parameters:
      association - the association whose paying dates data will be updated

    • updateAssociation

      public void updateAssociation(Association association)
      Updates the association data in the database.
      Parameters:
      association - the association object containing the updated data

    • updatePrices

      public void updatePrices(Association association)
      Updates the prices data in the database.
      Parameters:
      association - the association object containing the updated prices data

    • checkIfTablesExists

      public void checkIfTablesExists()
      Checks if the necessary tables exist in the database and creates them if they don't.
